title: Tank fans are NOT asking for more damage - NO TY TO BAMI'S CINDER CHANGES
body:
I loved being able to play a tank when they were viable.

I've never picked a tank with the intention of dealing damage.

I've literally never seen a tank player advocating for tanks to do more damage, either here, or on Reddit, or any Discord server that I belong to.

It feels like its almost been 2 years now, that tank players have been asking for their champions to be made more durable, or at least provide some defense/protection against all the burst damage flying around now.

Nobody has been asking for anything remotely close to these Bami's Cinder buffs.

What the actual hell is going on?

HP is only a particular stat and buffing it would result only in being harder to be bursted, nothing else. There are multiple levers, like Armor, MR, HP Regen, in-kit shields and heals. However, people have actually requested buffs to the HP Stat Runes that almost always seem the worst choice.

Overall, people have been asking for:

1) Higher Resistances/HP from Stat Runes

2) Buffs to runes in Resolve tree for durability (runes which almost all tanks pick).

3) Trading a champion's damage for higher durability (lowering base damage for higher base stats, including Armor/MR/HP)

4) While not buffs themselves, people have been asking for Riot to change their balance approach. Currently they tend to buff mostly damage and lower durability. Just looking at Rammus and Singed in the latest patch kinda shows their approach. Ornn has been a victim of this.

Heck, if you ask me, I would gladly add @100 base HP to everyone in the game. I don't really care what stat is changed as long as they have significant impact.
